title: Metamorphic Psychiatry
image_alt: Helping people fully become what God intended them to be.
body:
**Anthony Duk, MD**

As an adult psychiatrist for nearly 20 years, I help empower patients to find meaning and coach them on changing their lifestyles. Medication, reading self help books, exercising, journaling and social interactions are all vital to changing for the better. I rely on my background with the Catholic faith to help people become fully who God intended them to be.





> *"﻿Every man dies, but not every man lives."* \
> —Sir William Wallace
